ygData.subject: Creatures of the night
ygData.msgSnippet: Diamond:: She drew her dagger and offered it to Devilduer. Here, see if you can use this to detatch that thing off her. She watched this bot closely.

Diamond::

She drew her dagger and offered it to Devilduer. "Here, see if you 
can use this to detatch that thing off her."

She watched this bot closely.  Something about this femme bot make 
her scales crawl.  She couldn't put her finger on it, but this bot 
was nothing like she had ever seen before.
